amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 to prevent H. R. 467 from taking effect until the Secretary of Health and Human Services and the Attorney General each certify that H. R. 467 will lead to a reduction in overdose deaths.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prevent H. R. 467 from taking effect until the Secretary of Health and Human Services and the Attorney General each certify that H. R. 467 will lead to a reduction in overdose deaths.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pettersen amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 233 (Roll no. 236).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Pettersen.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pettersen amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 233 (Roll no. 236).
